description: Create column recon-genre at index 4 based on column term using expression grel:if(or(cells["vocabulary"].value=="fast",cells["vocabulary"].value=="gmgpc",cells["vocabulary"].value=="lcgft",cells["vocabulary"].value=="lcsh",cells["vocabulary"].value=="local"),value,"")
Text transform on cells in column recon-genre using expression grel:value.replace(" 14th century","--14th century")
Text transform on cells in column recon-genre using expression grel:value.replace(" 16th century","--16th century")

expression: grel:"GENRE FAST RECON, STEP 3: START FAST RECON "+now()
description: Text transform on cells in column workflow_current using expression grel:"GENRE FAST RECON, STEP 3: START FAST RECON "+now()
Text transform on cells in column workflow_history using expression grel:value + " | " + cells["workflow_current"].value
